# @afena/cli

## Usage

```bash
pnpm afena
```

### Build

```bash
pnpm build
```

### Development

```bash
pnpm dev
```

## Exports

| Subpath | Conditions |
|---|---|
| `.` | default: `dist/index.js`, types: `dist/index.d.ts` |

## Scripts

| Script | Command |
|---|---|
| `build` | `tsup` |
| `dev` | `tsup --watch` |
| `meta:check` | `node dist/index.js meta check` |
| `test` | `vitest run` |
